---

# Using the GitHub CLI Copilot extension

This article provides details about the replacement for the Copilot extension for GitHub CLI.

# [Replacing the retired Copilot extension](#replacing-the-retired-copilot-extension)

The GitHub Copilot extension for GitHub CLI is retired. It has been replaced by the new GitHub Copilot CLI. See [About GitHub Copilot CLI](/en/copilot/concepts/agents/about-copilot-cli).
